title: Dice
description: FOR MATURE AUDIENCE ONLY!!!What do you do when you catch your fiance sleeping with another woman?For Ariana Bolton, the answer is simple.Sleep with another man to get even.But Ariana isn't settling for just any guy. She hires a "host" from Dice, an underground club, famous for their selection of top rated men willing to be at the beck and call of any woman who can afford their price.Luke Strutten, the host Ariana picked, is handsome, and knows how to please a woman but he's rude and sarcastic, nothing like the obedient host Ariana was expecting.Ariana is supposed to be in charge, she's paying for his services after all. But she soon finds herself being swept under Luke's dominating self. And Ariana can't help but enjoy every minute of it...
author: Dorothy L.
